text: Mechanicsville is an unincorporated community in Center Township, Vanderburgh County, in the U.S. state of Indiana. It is located within the city limits of Evansville. ==History== A post office was established at Mechanicsville in 1829, and remained in operation until it was discontinued in 1879. ==Geography== Mechanicsville is located at . ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Vanderburgh County, Indiana Category:Unincorporated communities in Indiana
title: Mechanicsville, Indiana
